# [Interview #1121: Brandon Sanderson Book Signing at JordanCon 8, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1121#1)

#### Melissa

Do Scadrians have a piece of Harmony?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yup.
